data.description: issueFixedAmount is used to create new tokens with fixed total supply.

parameters.name: from_address
parameters.help: The address sends out tokens. This address must belong to my wallet (ismine = true) and has enough satoshis to pay miner fee. You could import the address to omnicore (will be ismine = true).

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: the name for the new tokens to be created

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.help: the ecosystem to create the tokens in (1 for main ecosystem, 2 for testing ecosystem)

parameters.name: divisible_type
parameters.help: the type of the tokens to create: (1 for indivisible tokens, 2 for divisible tokens)

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: a description for the new tokens (can be empty '')

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the number of tokens to create. The minimum amount is 1.

data.description: issueManagedAmout is used to create new tokens with manageable supply. NOTE: Record the txid returned by the OBD, and then you can use the GetTransaction (type-102118) API to get the property ID of the manageable asset you issued.

parameters.name: from_address
parameters.help: the address sends out tokens. This address must belong to your wallet (ismine = true) and has enough satoshis to pay miner fee. You could import the address to omnicore (will be ismine = true).

parameters.name: name
parameters.help: the name of the new tokens to create

parameters.name: ecosystem
parameters.help: the ecosystem to create the tokens in (1 for main ecosystem, 2 for testing ecosystem)

parameters.name: divisible_type
parameters.help: the type of the tokens to create: (1 for indivisible tokens, 2 for divisible tokens)

parameters.name: data
parameters.help: a description for the new tokens (can be empty '')

data.description: sendGrant is used to issue or grant new units of managed tokens.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.help: The identifier of the tokens to grant. Get it by invoke GetTransaction (type 1206) interface by the txid returned by issuanceManaged (type 1202) API.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the amount of tokens to create

parameters.name: memo
parameters.help: a text note attached to this transaction (none by default)

data.description: sendRevoke is used to revoke units of managed tokens.

parameters.name: property_id
parameters.help: The identifier of the tokens to be revoked. Get it by invoke GetTransaction (type 1206) API by the txid returned by issuanceManaged (type 1202) API.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.help: the amount of tokens to revoke

parameters.name: memo
parameters.help: a text note attached to this transaction (none by default)
